title: Waters
author: ''
date: '2022-09-08'
slug: waters
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $7.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Waters. The average
  contract duration was 0.78 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $109.6K. The longest
  contract was 5.13 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.2M.
lookup_name: 'WATERS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '7.5M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '334'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '26'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '8%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '95%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.23'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '9.9M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.78'
s421_mean_contract_value: '109.6K'
s425_max_duration: '5.13'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.2M'
---
